summary: VEHICLE WAS UNSTABLE AND WANDERED WHILE IN MOTION.  PROBLEMS WITH REAR SHOCKS.  *MR  REPAIRS WERE MADE BUT NOT REGARDING THE CONSUMERS CONCERN.  THE DEALER/MANUFACTURER STATED THE STEERING CHARACTERISTIC WAS COMMON FOR THIS LONG BODY APPLICATION.  (RV/JAYCO 3230K S/N X26NK0088)  *SCC   *JB
